comment: The form /ʰé/ may optionally precede this element (Tosco 2001:211). In addition, the free variant /kí/ is also listed (Tosco 2001:211).

The form /ʰé/ may optionally precede this element (Tosco 2001:211). In addition, the free variant /kí/ is also listed (Tosco 2001:211).

This enclitic also functions as an emphasis marker (Tosco 2001:247-8). In addition, note that the phonologically conditioned variant /=llé/ occurs when this element attaches to a word with a final vowel (Tosco 2001:247).
